DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate acute effect standardize extract KRG ( Rg3-KRG ) consist 30 % total ginsenosides , include 10 % Rg3 ginsenoside arterial stiffness blood pressure , measure follow parameter : aortic augmentation index , peripheral blood pressure , central blood pressure
DOC.brief_title: Korean Red Ginseng Rg3 Extract Arterial Stiffness Blood Pressure
DOC.criteria: Healthy Age 1870 year BMI < 30 kg/m2 Brachial systolic blood pressure < 140 mmHg Brachial diastolic blood pressure < 90 mmHg Main BMI > 30kg/m2 Hypertensive ( brachial systolic BP ≥140mmHg and/or diastolic BP ≥90mmHg ) Pregnancy
